name: Use Pong
description:
I made this game in 4 hours following a 6 min YouTube tutorial lol. Its actually not too bad and is 100% playable if you have 2 players (idk how to make a AI ok)

Controls:

Player 1: W and S

Player 2: Up and Down arrow

Pause: Escape

Song used: 

Thanks for checking out this little game!
